Room very nice with a nice balcony clean bathroom comfortable bed, not the nicest view but again excellent location Good breakfast and nice staff in general.  Don't remember the name  of the nice lady who worked at the registration desk during the day,  but need to say she was very pleasant and helpful. No doubts that in my next visit to this amazing city, I wouldn't hesitated to use this hotel. Thank you for such pleasant stay! Cary & Oscar Ossa

title: Substandard Hotel, Not a Internet Hotel
review: Dear Cary & Oscar,  PERFECT…… We like PERFECT!  On behalf of all the staff at Delle Nazioni Hotel, GRAZIE MILLE for your very kind words.  It is with immense pleasure to hear that you found everything about Delle Nazioni Hotel amazing, location, accomodation and service.   We will be sure to share your lovely words with all our team.  With your feedback you have undoubtedly given us an extra boost to continue to perform at the high standards that our guests have grown accustomed to receiving.   Looking forward to welcome you in the near future, we send our warmest wishes for a Merry Christmas and Happy New Year  Kind regards,  Giovanni Mariella - General Manager

title: Friendly staff, but hotel not so much
review: Stayed in four hotels during our Italian vacation and this was one of better hotels and rooms. Perfectly situated for us as it is right next to the train station and very close to the major attractions (Duomo, Ponte Vecchio, Academia Galleria, etc.). If I were to visit Florence, I would ask for this hotel again, no doubt.   The desk staff was very helpful and kind, able to answer all of your "Florence where to Go" questions. All three desk staff members were great, especially liked the female clerk, but all were very helpful.   The free breakfast was excellent, and has vending machines for water, soda, snacks (most hotels did not have this feature!). Room was clean, comfortable, quiet.   The only negative, for an "Internet" hotel, the Internet was very slow and iffy...same as…

title: Good, but very slow internet
review: Dear Mr Logan,  We really thank you for your review and we are happy to see that you completely understood the meening and the atmosphere of our Hotel.  We work really hard to transfer to our guests the feelings we have and the mood of the hotel and of the staff so that all of them can feel part of us and we really appreciate when someone like you can see all this.  Hope to have you here again and make your experience be even better than the last time.  Many thanks & regards,  Giovanni Mariella  General Manager

title: The go-to hotel in Florence.
review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. Commuters and tourists come across the constant hustle and bustle of the station before exiting, taking a few steps and stopping amazed in Piazza di Santa Maria Novella. It is impossible not to admire the the square, housing one of the most charming basilicas in Florence. The area has plenty of local spots to taste Tuscan specialties, but don’t stop in the main streets alone; the narrower side streets always ensure satisfaction. The huge Parco Delle Cascine provides a solution to the need for a green area as well as a historic welcome in the form of a bronze statue of King Vittorio Emanuele II riding a horse.

title: Clean, Safe and Convenient, but . . .
review: Who wouldn't love this place?   IAs for having a conder location, ts across the street from the train station and bus terminal, a short walking distance to the historic section of Florence, has a staff that bends over backwards to make your stay in Florence memorable, a terrific breakfast buffet, a 10% discount to a great restaurant a few steps out the door.  What else is there?    Well if I tell you I've stayed here three times in less than two years, you've got to know I love the place!  Despite the fact that  there were only two of us, we had a huge room with  king sized bed, plus another twin bed!  Looking out our window we could see the Duomo's dome.  Simply love this place!  Can't wait to go back.

title: Good location
review: Dear Customer,  MILLE GRAZIE!!!!!  You have given us the greatest motivational tool any business owner could wish for!   The proof that our extra efforts do make a difference.   On behalf of all the staff at Delle Nazioni Hotel, who provided you with the great service all our customers have grown to expect from us,   GRAZIE for having stayed with us, we wait for your THIRD visit,  Kindest regards and ARRIVEDERCI!  Elisabetta

title: Great hotel and amazing location
review: If you are looking for a hotel close to the train station, this may be a good choice. It is on a busy, crowded street and not in the charming old part of Florence, close to any charming piazza, it is not the type of neighborhood where you would enjoy sitting outside at a cafe table. But it is close enough to many charming piazzas so that you can easily have that experience. The street noise was noticeable in our room but didn't keep us from sleeping. The room was comfortable and clean, and the staff was very friendly and helpful. The breakfast was adequate, although the coffee left a lot to be desired - this is Italy, for crying out loud! The wifi was difficult and frustrating, many dropped connections, and different passwords required for each device. For utility, this hotel is…

title: We stayed to this hotel for family vacations
review: Dear Hallisen,  MILLE GRAZIE to share your experience trought Tripadvisor.it  We are glad you found our location was a good position for attending all the famous Florence landmarks and we really hope that when you come to the capital again next time you will choose Hotel Delle Nazioni   As you can read from other feedback, we are always available to satisfy the guest's requests, we are anytime at disposal to change room according with the availability on several occasion.  We take this opportunity to remind to all our guests that italian expresso and cappuccino are available on request without charge.  After this, we really thank you for your review and we hope that in the next future you will like to be our guest again so that we can make your stay to be better than the last one.  See you soon, in the meantime, many hughes from all staff  Elisabetta

title: Well located hotel near the train station
review: All roads lead to Duomo.   My wife and I were in our honeymoon and stayed for 4 nights at the Delle Nazioni Hotel. It has a great location for touring the incredible city of Florence. Firenze is an incredible city.  Upon arrival we were upgraded to a room on the 4th floor. The room was very basic but had a small balcony with a great view. We also received and a bottle of Proseccio chilled on our arrival (nice touch).   We were positioned at the back of the hotel so we had no issue with train station noises which is a common complaint among other reviews. The walls are thin and we could here (quite clearly) some other amorous couples staying on our floor of the hotel. The hotel room is basic and we both found the bed quite hard and uncomfortable. The bathroom was a good size with…

title: Not worth it
review: Dear Adrian,  GRAZIE MILLE for taking the time to write such a nice review!   We are more than happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and you appreciated every aspects of our property and we managed to satisfy your expectations. Nice Touch!  We will certainly share your appreciation with all our employees!  We really hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back soon at Delle Nazioni Hotel, maybe for your Anniversary  Congratulation again by all staff!   Elisabetta

title: Lovely touch
review: This is a very basic hotel and its best feature is its location a block from the main train station - Santa Maria Novella.    The single bed bedroom I had was very basic befitting a budget hotel.   If you are only seeking a place to sleep and basic amenities while touring through Florence, then this is a decent place.

title: Warm and welcomed
review: Dear Mr. Sanjay,  Thank you very much for your kind words and for sharing your experience through Tripadvisor.  It is with immense pleasure to hear that you found Delle Nazioni Hotel very good for the location close by to all the major attractions.   We sincerely hope to welcome you again in the near future.  Warm regards,  Elisabetta

We will use your comments on our atmosphere and procedures as we continually evolve to best meet and exceed our guests' expectations.  We look forward of welcoming you back in the near future so until then, GRAZIE & ARRIVEDERCI!  Elisabetta

title: Budget rooms
review: Just aside central station, walking distance to all the site seeing points, and near the bus station to the Mall. Room is clean and big enough. Hotel staff and manager are nice, they helped me to fix reservation problem with the booking agency. Thank you so much!

title: Great location
review: Dear Beryl,  Many thanks for your positive review.   We are very glad you spent wonderful time in our city and above all in our hotel which has contributed to render your stay in Florence so special.  We hope and look forward to welcoming back very soon and in the meantime, we send a lot of hughes,  Elisabetta

title: Così così
review: I would have given this a perfect rating except for a couple of things... Their wifi rule is something i have never seen.  They give you a code and you have to log out when you leave the hotel else you need to request a new code from them.  It's still free but does become an inconvenience in a world where connecting to wifi should be the simplest thing in the world.   The second thing was that the rooms ( or at least the room we had)  had very thin walls.  If your neighbor was talking loudly outside,  you didn't have to strain your ears to hear the whole conversation.   Now the good part.  Excellent management.. They were friendly and personable.   Location is perfect especially for people who would be taking the train.  It is literally a two minute walk from that hotel.  It is…

title: Large room close to Florence termini
review: Short walk from the train station, and walkable to most parts of the city. Rooms are quite small and basic. Bathroom ok but shower is incredibly small and not a very comfortable experience. Staff were friendly but not all of them were very informative. Breakfast was a pretty basic affair.......did the job just not that exciting. Don't have anything really bad to say about this hotel....but.....sadly I don't have anything good to say about it either.

title: Location, what else!!
review: Dear Mrs Lindy,  Thank you for your review. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Delle Nazioni Hotel in Florence.   Your feedback is very valuable to us and I have shared your feedback with the rest of the team.  We look forward to welcome you back to Florence for a new experience  Sincerely  Elisabetta

title: Nice location but that's where it stops
review: Within 5 minutes walk of train station, clean facilities. Disappointed with superior balcony room was not worth the money. Yes you did get a nice view over rooftops but downside is you are above tram lines and busy street so very noisy, also too hot to sit out there, no shade, was good though to rinse out some clothes and use balcony to dry them. Big bathroom but stupidly has the smallest shower cubicle, you could hardly move in it, not sure how a larger person would manage. Staff were robotic , like they had rehearsed speech when checking in. I had the same monotone check in as the couple in front of me. Close to most of all Floence highlights, I found the walk everywhere quite pleasant. Hotel was fine for the price

title: good location, good sized room
review: Dear Client,  Thanking you for the time spending to write your feedback, we are very sorry that your stay was not according with your expectations. You booked a standard double room with balcony and you got a free upgrade to a Superior room with terrace! We have a lot of pictures of Superior rooms on web sites and they reflect the size and the open terraces, unfortunately for you, this year the summer was really hot, unfortunately you were not able to take full advantage of the terrace. We always reiterate our guests to advice us for any problem you might have, if we do not know we are not able to meet your wishes. At the check-in time, we are glad of giving to all customers all information they might need repeating them to everyone, we understand that for those in queue can be annoying but we love to treat all people in the same way. Hope to have you here again and make your experience be even better than the last time. Best regards, Giovanni Mariella - General Manager

review: The good thing about this hotel is the location. It is just a walking distance away from  Florence S.M.N train station (at the back side). The breakfast and limited wifi were ok but not better than other hotels of the same class we booked in for out Italy trip. I requested a spacious room with nice view on upper floors with 2 single beds months before our trip, but we got 219. This room was big for 2 people (2 single beds and 1 Queen sized bed), but the mattresess of the single beds were not firmly attached to the bed frame. There was a bathtub with shower but no shower curtain so the floor got a bit flooded, and no rubber bathtub mat that can be used to prevent slips and falls in the tub. Although the tiles and walls of the bathroom seemed renovated, the toilet seat was…

review: Dear Guest,  We are very sorry that your stay was not according with your expectations. We were surprised of your review but we regret that you have not informed us about your problems. We continuously reiterate our customers that we cannot help you if we are not informed.  We also provide  rubber bathtub mat. We never write in all description that we have frigobar, we have vending machine on floors. title: NEXT TO THE TRAIN STATION
review: This was my favorite hotel in Italy (visited Rome & Venice also). The balcony was amazing. The room & bathroom was very spacious, clean & modern. The AC worked great. Only downfall was the WIFI. It worked slow and would kick you off in a few minutes.

review: Dear Guest, We are very sorry that your stay was not according with your expectations. We were surprised of your review but we are very sad that you have not informed us about your problems. From your description we believe that  your review is the consequence for what happen outside the hotel. As you know our hotel is clean ( please, read other reviews) and for breakfast  we serve cold and hot like: cereals, yoghurt,  cakes, various croissants, tomatoes, fresh fruit, scrambles eggs, three kind of bread, slices bread for toast, ham, cheese, rusks, various marmelade, beans, tomato,  cream chocolate, butter, fruit juices and the machine with italian and american coffee, chocolate, tea, milk, plus we serve on request coffee and cappuccino from the bar without any fee.  We hope on your next stay you will have a much better experience and a greater feeling of what this hotel can really offer you.  Thank you again for your time and we definitely look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back in. Best regards, Giovanni Mariella General Manager

title: Nice location!
review: This was an excellent location, next to train station, close to bus lines, easy access to taxis. Room was a good size, clean and a comfortable bed, good pillows, breakfast included. A/c worked very good, ( Wife said it was cold, I liked it ). The staff were very friendly and helpfull. Excellent restaraunts close by, market next to train station, within minutes to shopping, and great Gilatto !!!

A good price for the rooms which were comfortable and spacious.  The upstairs waiting area had several computers and a bar which was available for guests.  This was my first time at this property and I would not hesitate to stay again on my next visit to Florence.

title: Walking distance from the Santa Maria Novella Station
review: Dear Guest,  It is fantastic to read that you had a wonderful stay at the Hotel and found the staff to be courteous and helpful, moreover the rooms cleaned.  It is always wonderful to hear such positive feedback, which serves as a great motivator to my team.  It shows them that their passion and efforts to provide exceptional service are appreciated by those who receive it.  Thank you for your kind words and the time you took to share your experience.  We wish you a warm welcome back to Florence and to our Hotel !  Best regards,  Giovanni Mariella  - General Manager

title: Don't expect much.
review: Stayed here for three nights. Decent rooms, very clean bathrooms, good customer service. Breakfast spread was pretty good but the menu did not change at all. Overall excellent place,good value for money, perfect and safe location. Highly recommend!

We could open 2 luggage (27" in size) side by side without getting into anyone way.  3)Service : Excellent They were quick in response , eg we ask for extra pillow and they brought it immediately  4)Breakfast : OK Decent stuff like toast, cereal and ham.   5) Surrounding : Excellent There are a few Italian restuarants on the same street as the hotel and a supermarket on the opposite street (next to the train station)    PS: Flight of stairs (7 steps) from the hotel entrance to the lift lobby  cheers moncapu

review: clean towels and linen but that was it. Grubby and tatty. Noisiest place I've ever stayed. Really not good. Coffee for breakfast was good but the rest was just basic. Would not ever recommend his hotel.  Good location though.

title: Florence, Italy
review: This is a very convenient location, more or less next to Santa Maria Novella station and a walk to tour pick-ups and public transportation. The hotel is modern and their buffet breakfast is pretty good (nothing out of this world), is kept clean; you have very friendly and not so friendly people at the front desk -or perhaps she was just having a bad day- but they will help with if you need help and push for it. You can walk to lots of restaurants (there is a very nice one just around the corner) and a great gelateria just a few blocks away, worth walking 3xday to Romana...yummm

title: room with a view
review: Dear Mrs Patricia,  Thank you for the nice words spent and for taking the time to write a review about your stay in our Hotel.  We really appreciate the beautiful words and are happy to know that you enjoyed the time in the Hotel.   Thank you from the whole staff and hope to have you here again in the next future.   A big Huge from Florence,  Elisabetta

title: Great Hotel.
review: The staff was extremely helpful but that is all I can positively say.  The rooms were stripped down without even pictures on the wall.  There was no bathroom counter and nothing to put stuff on in the shower.  There was no coffee pot or fridge.  The bed was comfortable but the room felt like a college dorm.  Close to train station.  Sorry, but this is not a comfortable place for Americans.

title: Fine location in Firenze (Florence), Italy
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to share your views on your recent stay. As you can see on our web description we do not have coffee pots or fridge in our rooms, we wrote it several times our feedback on Tripadvisor. Our furniture are simples as you can see on our web site and you know that the pictures reflect the reality. We are disappointed  that you wrote that our Hotel is not for American, but I would like to  inform you that many American guests   choose  to stay with us for many reasons: location, accommodation , service, staff. Please do not give wrong information to clients which are considering our property. We usually take good note of complaints and take good care of all comments of clients but we cannot accept such a misleading review of our property without defending the good name of our hotel. Hoping to have the pleasure to welcome you in our hotel in the near future, Best regards Giovanni Mariella General manager

title: A very good option for a pleasant stay in Firenze
review: Dear Ashish, Thank you for choosing to stay with us while visiting Florence, it is nothing more rewarding for us than to see customers like you coming back to our profile and sharing their experience, this is what helps us become better and better every day. I have shared your comments with the team who are very thankful to your words. We look forward to your next visit in our hotel Kindest Regards Giovanni Mariella and Hotel Delle Nazioni team

title: Good for a 3*, can't fault the location!
review: Nice hotel within close access to the SMN Train Station. Rooms were clean & tidy. Service was good, big breakfast room & great variety of food.  Would stay again if I was looking for something of good value.

title: Can't beat the location for a short stay
review: Dear Madam, Thank you for choosing to stay in our hotel, it seems that our location worked in your favor, it is good to see that you enjoyed our  breakfast and we hope that you will give us the opportunity to accommodate you again. We look forward to your next visit in our hotel, Kindest Regards, Giovanni Mariella and Hotel Delle Nazioni Team

Very close to station and not a far stroll from the Duomo and other major sites.  The staff are very helpful and friendly and always smiling when you return which is nice.  Good value and always a great stay.

title: Hotel without Refrigerator and could hear every single noise around the room
review: Dear Customer,  Can’t tell you how happy we are that you found AGAIND the Delle Nazioni Hotel to your liking.   It’s always so encouraging and gratifying to receive such feedback.   MILLE GRAZIE for having stayed with us for THREE times it was a true pleasure having you!!!!  We do hope to have you back again so, ARRIVEDERCI and thank you again!  HAPPY NEW YEAR Sincerely, Elisabetta Argento

title: Excellent stay
review: Have stayed at a few hotels near the station and will probably come back here.  If you don't mind the noise of the station, I don't, then it's great for arrival/ depature as it/ only a 2 minute walk over e tram tracks to the bus stop or train station.  Also, loads of shops nearby for snacks and drinks.   Hotel has quite big, high ceilinged rooms, a huge bed and everything you need.  Beautifully made up every day.   It was warm, we had the window open which made it a bit noisier, but it was fine for us.  Loads and loads of satellite channels on the tv.  Basic continental breakfast but loads of it.  Seemed really popular lots of international tourists staying.  Staff were multi lingual and friendly and welcoming, offering to book trips and attractions for you.  Free wifi in rooms…

title: Not bad not great
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us at Delle Nazioni Hotel and we are thrilled that your stay was enjoyable.   Our staff take great pride in putting our guests at the heart of everything we do and our team are always very encouraged when a guest has left their stay feeling brilliant.   Your feedback is of great value to us all.  Merry Christmas & Happy New Year 2015  Elisabetta Argento

title: Hotel has seen better days, but...
review: Gloomy hotel next to the train station, loud and unwelcoming. We stayed 2 nights, and twice was provided wrong room key upon coming back from sight seeing. It was quite difficult to sleep due to loud outside sounds, and weird bathroom unit played its part in nose pollution as well.

title: Loud. Don't plan on sleeping.
review: To be honest, I was disappointed when I entered my single room. Maybe it was allocated in an older wing of the hotel because the bathroom was at least two decades old and the room had definitely seen better days. It looked like a mashup of old and new. The door also didn't seemed very secure as it looked like it was protruding out. Like most hotels, the walls are rather thin as I could heard the plumbing whenever other guests next door shower or use the toilet! However, there were also some positives which sort of grew on me after a couple of days! And I think to be fair to the hardworking folks at the hotel, I should also highlight them.  Pros: 1. The location is really convenient and diagonally opposite the Firenze S.M.N train station.  2. As a solo female traveller, I also…

title: Decent stay, some shortfalls
review: Dear Customer,  Thanks for your nice review, your words will be very useful to improve our job for a better service.  Our staff take great pride in putting our guests at the heart of everything we do and our team are always very encouraged when a guest has left their stay feeling brilliant.   We appreciated that you have not stopped to the first impression but you had the time to enjoyed all our efforts to make the guests' stay truly enjoyable and memorable   We are glad you found our location was a good position for attending all the famous Florence sightseeing and we really hope that when you come to the capital again next time you will choose Delle Nazioni Hotel   GRAZIE & ARRIVEDERCI Elisabetta Argento  We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you again at the Delle Nazioni Hotel,  Sincerely Elisabetta Argento

title: Average hotel for the average traveler
review: The staff was okay. It was strange they made us pay the city tax up front and in cash. No other place in Italy made us do this. I think it is hilarious they make a big deal of calling themselves an internet hotel. It is 2014. Everybody has internet. The funny thing is that their wifi was not very good. It was very slow. They did have computers in the lobby that could be used that were better. The room was a good size and clean. The problem though is that the walls are paper thin. We could not sleep because every time somebody in an adjacent room used the bathroom we could here them and the plumbing as if we were right next to them. One of our neighbors had a cough which kept us up all night. We could also hear the train and traffic all night. We did not get any sleep. Also has…

title: Stayed before but there are better places close by for less!
review: Right opposite train station and bus loops and a nice close walk to major attractions. However, internet was average with Wifi dropping out every time your device went to standby, meaning you would have to log in all over again every time. Hotel staff would also request room key whenever you leave hotel to avoid you losing it. Bit weird, was accidentally given wrong room key once which made us unsure of the safety of our room. Word of advice, just keep your key with you at all times.

title: Great Location
review: Dear Guest,  Thanks for sharing your experience throught Tripadvisor,  The wi-fi system has a log-in and log-out procedure to preserve your data when you use the internet point in hotel, the staff advice all people to do not hesitate to ask for a new password if this procedure was boring.  To protect our customers we ask to leave the key at the desk to check people coming and going at each shift change.  Kind regards,  Giovanni Mariella General Manager

title: Good value!
review: Stayed here a few years ago, chose it again because of it locality. Desk clerk was unhelpful and unfriendly. We had booked a room for a few weeks later for our daughter and grandchild and wanted to upgrade it to a family room......that couldn't be done it seems because we had booked it online and there for had to change it online, which we couldn't do. The room was clean but not maintained well , the ceiling in the bathroom was caving in. No soap or shampoo in the room.  Wifi was in and out Tried to have Expedia cancel our booking for later in the month but still got charged on credit card because we were too late..........(had been trying to change it for 2 weeks and couldn't )Oh well you live and learn......my tip??? Stay at hotel Montreal ......

title: Excellent location!!!
review: Dear Guest We thank you for staying with us and for your time to provide us with a review regarding your recent stay. We are sorry to hear we did not meet your expectations on this occasion. We do hope you will give us the opportunity to restore your faith in us and give you a greater feeling of what this hotel can really offer. Should you consider returning and would like to contact me in advance of your arrival, the team and I will look forward to showing you a good level of service. Thank you again for your time and we definitely look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back in the near future. Giovanni Mariella General Manager

title: Great location. Friendly staff. Amazing breakfast.
review: Loved this place. We stayed here in March 2014 and we delighted to again be booked into it again for three days in early November 2014.  Great staff, and they even remembered me from the previous visit earlier in the year.  Was sent up a bottle of champagne as my birthday was a few days earlier.  The room was surprising as while there were only two of us, we literally had what was equivalent to a suite and it had a king bed and two twin beds.  Breakfast was very good and we also were offered cappachino free when we were in the lounge later in the day.  There was free wi'fi in the hotel and also 5 computers available to guests.  The location couldn't be better.  Just across the street from the train station and the hotel gives a 10% discount card for La Portale, a  nice…

title: A Bit Outdated But Tolerable
review: Dear Customer,  MILLE GRAZIE for your beautiful review! We can not forget a sunny and smiling lady as you!  You have given us the greatest motivational tool any business owner could wish for!   The proof that our extra efforts do make a difference.   On behalf of all the staff at Delle Nazioni Hotel, who provided you with the great service all our customers have grown to expect from us,   GRAZIE for having stayed with us again and we hope to welcome you for your third time!   To the next time, ARRIVEDERCI!  Elisabetta Argento

title: Location,  Location, Location - Hotel Delle Nazioni
review: We stayed here a few nights for our honeymoon. We were pleasantly surprised with a bottle of champagne on our first night there!  The hotel is located right by the train station and there are several good restaurants within walking distance. We had a room with a balcony overlooking the train station. The room was simple but had everything we needed for our stay. They had a huge variety of breakfast options. They also offer free wifi which was nice in looking up directions and reviews. Overall we had a very nice stay and I would recommend this place to others.

review: This was our second visit to this hotel.  It is clean, spacious, affordable and we had a super room with a balcony and view across the city.  Staff were friendly, approachable and polite.  Breakfast is excellent with a wide choice and a very pleasant breakfast room.  Location is superb, being five minute walk from the Santa Maria Novella station and when (not if!) we return to Florence, we will stay here again. Recommended.

title: Good experience
review: Dear Guest,  We really thank you for your review and we are happy to see that you completely understood the meening and the atmosphere of our Hotel.  We work really hard to transfer to our guests the feelings we have and the mood of the hotel and of the staff so that all of them can feel part of us and we really appreciate when someone like you can see all this.  Hope to have you here again for the THIRD VISIT and make your experience be even better than the last time.   MILLE GRAZIE & ARRIVEDERCI Elisabetta Argento

title: Very Central
review: My husband and I stayed last week for 3 nights. Reception staff very helpful and English speaking. Our room overlooked the street and there was a metal grill over the window. We could not move this, so no natural light or any view! The bathroom had a shower with unusual bifold doors, not to be recommended. The shower head was fixed at one height and moved a few degrees from side to side. No plug in the basin. The coffee and hot chocolate at breakfast was very diluted as was the fruit juice.  Several nice restaurants near by and within easy walking of all the main attractions. Close to the train and bus stations, but definitely not enough to tempt us to stay here again.

title: The best location!
review: Dear customer,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review.  We are stunned by your description of the window, we have not understood your problem right away, all the windows are fitted with roll-up blinds "Tapparella or Avvolgibile"  that can be opened with a rope on the side of the window!   Our staff is also always available to explain all the mechanisms of the rooms.  As you may have noticed at breakfast we serve espresso, cappuccino, chocolate .. with the bar machine for those who want stronger drinks.   We regret that for a reason so trivial the stay has not been positive, we hope to see you soon for a new better experience  Best regards,  Giovanni Mariella

review: The hotel was decent but the staff was very unfriendly and a bit rude at times. The one staff member in particular was Elizabetta. She did not have any patience when we asked questions. Other than the lack of customer service is was so-so.

title: comfortable and convenient
review: Dear Guest,  We are mortified to have given you a different impression of our staff especially me. Our staff is always helpful and polite. We remember that you often did not have the patience to wait your turn not observing the queue of waiting customers. We hope to have the chance to meet you again and correct the misunderstanding that there was among us. Sincerely yours,  Elisabetta Argento

title: No atmosphere
review: Pleasantly surprised when I entered the hotel.  Clean, good size rooms, good breakfast, steps and stairs are really usable and well positioned, easy to walk up and down to. I travel solo and I highly recommend this hotel. Forget about the view from the hotel, you need to get out and see/visit the actual sites! Transport is quite easy or you can simply walk around. I wish there are at least English channels on TV (or a news channel in English). Wifi signal was actually good compared to other hotels I stayed in where I can barely get any and I was on 4th floor.

title: Great spot so close to train station
review: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time and trouble to write a review further to your recent stay at the Delle Nazioni  hotel. I was delighted to learn that you enjoyed your stay with us. We certainly value guest feedback as it helps us to improve service and facilities we offer.  Once again thank you for your review and kind comments.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Delle Nazioni Hotel  in the future. . Best regards Giovanni Mariella

title: Really good hotel
review: When we arrived at our room, it smelt very bad of cigarette smoke that we had to open our balcony door the whole night!  It was a decent sized room with ensuite. We were at the highest level so we had a lovely view of florence. We were not even minutes away from the station and trams which was beneficial. Breakfast was average,wifi was okay, it would log you out often so it was annoying having to re log everytime you wanted to use the wifi.    We stayed in florence for about 5 or so days, so everytime our room was cleaned it would still smell like cigarette smoke!

title: Wonderful 3 days in Florence.
review: Dear Guest,  Thanks for your nice review, your words have been very useful to improve our efforts for a better service.   First of all we apologized with you for the bad smell of cigarettes,  we are really surprised because our hotel is non-smoking, we are wondering why you did not present the problem to the front desk; we changed the room or in case of fully booked hotel we surely changed the curtains and the cover.  We continuously reiterate to our customers that we cannot help you if we are not informed.  We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you again at the Delle Nazioni Hotel,   Sincerely Elisabetta Argento

title: Great location
review: Myself and my wife stayed here for 3 nights. We came in from Pisa and the hotel was just across the road from the train station. Upon arrival our room was not ready. Alot of people were arriving at this time. We were able to put our suitcases in a lock up till it was ready.  At reception this is loads of brochures on trips, excursions and other things to see and do, and it can all be booked through the hotel. We booked a Chianti wine tasting afternoon which was very enjoyable.   We were delighted to hear we got an upgrade on our room. We got the 5th floor (I think). The room was spacious, very clean and the bathroom was kept very well. We had a balcony which has lovely views.  Breakfast was very good. The breakfast room is big but gets busy at certain times and of the morning.  …

title: Excellent stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your kind words and for sharing your experience through Tripadvisor.  It is with immense pleasure to hear that you found everything about Delle Nazioni Hotel amazing, location, accomodation and service.   We will be sure to share your lovely words with all our team.  We sincerely hope to welcome you again soon.  GRAZIE MILLE & warm regards,  Elisabetta Argento

title: Great Hotel. Excellent Location and Very Clean and Reasonable.
review: Stayed only one night with a smooth and easy check in and check out. Rooms were big and clean but had a small safe and no fridge facilities. Breakfast but basic but enough for a good start to the morning. Walking distance to most of the Florence attractions and service was friendly and efficient.

title: Excellent hotel
review: Dear Guest,   Can’t tell you how happy we are that you found Delle Nazioni Hotel in Florence to your liking and you enjoyed all this in a night!!! We do hope to have you back so, ARRIVEDERCI and thank you again!  A big kiss from Florence, Elisabetta Argento

title: Perfect location
review: Dear Guest,  We are glad you found our location was a good position for attending all the major monuments and sights.   We really hope that when you will come to the capital again next time you will choose Hotel Delle Nazioni.  Once again thank you for your great feedback, our team and  management are always really thrilled to know that we made our guests feel brilliant!  See you again soon.  Elisabetta Argento

title: Near the train station
review: This was an excellent choice for us in Florence given the fact that it is affordable and literally a 5 min. walk from the train station.  I stayed in a 4 star hotel in Rome and the Delle Nazioni had a very comparable breakfast and some may argue a better breakfast than the 4 star hotel.  Staff were very helpful and pleasant to deal with regarding any questions we had.  Rooms were fine - we were given a room with a cute balcony during our 4 night stay.  Beds were a little firm but that didn't bother us  as we prefer a firmer bed.  I would give this hotel a very solid 4 star rating and would certainly recommend for the price and the location.

title: Centrally located
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your fantastic review on the Delle Nazioni. We are delighted that you compare us to longer established hotels in Rome and appreciate the great comments about the service and attention to detail in the hotel.  We do strive to consistently deliver only the highest levels of guest service and to receive such wonderful praise is great to read.  We look forward to welcoming you back again soon,  Sincerely Elisabetta Argento

Best thing about the hotel is that it is very close to the train station as well as some good restaurants and tourist spots. We definitely recommend the hotel.

We look forward to welcoming you back to The Delle Nazioni, In the meantime, I send you my warmest regards, Giovanni Mariella  Giovanni Mariella

Also agood city to rent a Segway/Scooter in.

title: Great location!
review: We stayed in this hotel for just one night in June--it was conveniently located right near the train station and very easy to find. We enjoyed the large rooms, but the decor is very dated and the wifi is hit or miss (depending on where your room is located). The breakfast room is nice and the food was adequate. Not sure we would choose it again.

title: Excellent location will use again
review: Dear Cutomer,  We thank you for staying with us and for your time to provide us with your review about your recent stay.   We are sorry that you were not able to use the wi-fi, in May we installed several routers on each level to better capture the signal, our staff provide at the check-in the wi-fi device for 72 hours but to use full time the guests have to log out following the instructions, if you close internet without log off the password expired , but at the desk you will find all password's connection  you might need. We hope that you appreciated our free wi-fi connection instead to pay an extra charge as required in many modern hotel chain of Europe.  We hope on your next stay you will have a much better experience and a greater feeling of what this hotel can really offer you.  Thank you again for your time and we definitely look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back in the near future.  Sincerely, Elisabetta Argento

title: Comfortable and convenient to train
review: We stayed in this hotel for 4 nights and we had a room with a balcony on the fifth floor. The view was really fantastic. The hotel is located just next to the central train station of Florence and is is very convenient as everything is close by. Buses for the city and for the country side, city center and places of interest (duomo, Ponte Vecchio, Uffizi, Piazza della Signoria etc.), many restaurants and cafe. The service was very kind and efficient and people at the reception spoke fluent English, yet everything was a little faceless. The room (and the bed)  was very big and comfortable, in modern rather minimal style. What stroke me was the cuboard which was huge and very beautiful - maybe the best closet I have seen in a hotel.   Nevertheless, there were two drawbacks. First…

title: Great 3 star hotel
review: Dear Customer,  Thank you very much for your kind words and for sharing your experience through Tripadvisor.  It is with immense pleasure to hear that you found everything about Delle Nazioni Hotel amazing, location, accomodation and service.   As you wrote our staff is always at disposal, we are wondering why you did not advice us about the smell.  In the dining room we have two instant machines but for lovers of strong coffee, our staff provide for expresso or cappuccino made by the bar machine without any charge, when you will return you have a strong expresso offered by home for  your entire stay!  We will be sure to share your lovely words with all our team.  We sincerely hope to welcome you again soon.  Warm regards,  Elisabetta Argento

title: Perfect location, brilliant service
review: It was great to get off the train and walk out of the train station and there was our hotel. The room was very nice and much larger than I had expected.  We were facing the train station so we had a great balcony room of the Duomo.  I guess I mentioned to Gate 1 when they arranged this trip that it was our 30th Wedding Anniversary.  We were very surprised to come back to our room after lunch the first day and they delivered a bottle of champagne.  The security here is very good and I would definitely recommend this hotel and I would stay here again if I ever make it to Florence.  Beautiful city and there is an excellent little Trattoria on the same block as this hotel.  We had two dinners here and it was very tasty.

title: Good Hotel, great location
review: Dear Guest,  We are so glad to read your beautiful feedback following your recent stay at Delle Nazioni.   We are delighted that you enjoyed the restaurant's suggestion and we are very proud that our team delivered a great service to you and that we met your expectations.  We do hope that we get the chance to welcome you back again in the near future or for your next Anniversary ,  Our kindest regards, Elisabetta Argento

title: Great location
review: We stayed at this hotel as part of our interrailing trip in march 2014. The hotel is clean, the rooms are nice and comfortable. Unfortunately I fell ill with good poisoning during my stay (nothing to do with food eaten at the hotel) , I never got a chance to thank the truly wonderful and helpful lady at the reception desk who was extremely kind to me and organised a doctor to come to the hotel. Staff are all lovely and I would recommend this hotel to other travellers

title: Cheap and cheerful!
review: Dear Customer,  Thanks for your beautiful words, I am really pleased to have been your "lifeline" and moreover to have satisfied your needs and flipped the fate of your vacation!   We are delighted and proud that our team delivered a great service to you and  we met your expectations.  A big huge from all staff and thanks again for your radiance feedback, we look forward to welcome you again at Delle Nazioni Hotel,  Kind regards, Elisabetta Argento

title: March Break
review: The hotel is very close to the main train station and you can easily walk to the city center. The room was clean and spacious; however the bathroom was a bit small and too noisy. You could hear when others flush the toilet during the night. The breakfast pretty ok, nothing outstanding, but good enough. The highlights are the friendly and helpful staff and the free wifi! I'd stay here again.

title: Good Location, Great Staff, A Little Noisy
review: Dear Guest,  MILLE GRAZIE for the nice words spent and for taking the time to write a review about your stay in our Hotel.  We really appreciate the beautiful words and are happy to know that you enjoyed the time in the Hotel.   Thank you from the whole staff and hope to have you here again in the next future.   Warm greeting from Florence  Elisabetta Argento

review: Santa Maria Novella train station welcomes the majority of the people arriving in Florence, which might explain the hectic pace. title: Average...Internet is terrible!
review: The hotel was very welcoming and extremely nice. The breakfast was good as well. They had an extra pillow and blanket in the room, which I needed because I really don't like flat pillows. I visited with a friend, and we stayed in a room that had two twin sized beds. The beds were so comfortable, and the room was a good size, especially the bathroom. It is very close to the train station, which, if you have a room facing that way, can be a little bothersome at night, but overall not a big deal. The bed was so comfy I slept fine. It's also a good location for walking to all the churches and sites in Florence, so that was very good.      The internet, however, was extremely slow. It was so slow. And sometimes it'd just quit working. It functioned well enough to keep in touch with…

title: Good breakfast.
review: Dear Customer,  Thanks for your beautiful review, your words have been very useful to improve our efforts for a better service.  We regret that you had problem with WI-FI connection, we are wondering why you did not advice our front desk, sometime just a little check of our routers to fix the situation, in alternative we suggest to try in the lobby where the signal is very strong.  We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you again at the Delle Nazioni Hotel,  Sincerely Elisabetta Argento

title: Great valued for money
review: Location is very good if you are traveling by train. Coming from a great hotel in Venice this place seems cold, with no signs that you are in Italy. The breakfast is mediocre at best. We had breakfast at 9:30 and it was a bit hard to find a table, well at least a clean table.  It wasnt until closing time that someone decided to start cleaning tables. Nobody greets you, pretty much self serve. I had read bad reviews about the internet and I complete agree! They advertise on their doors that they are an internet hotel, but its a joke! Do not expect it to be easy to get online! Everytime you want to get online expect to put in a code. The speeds are horrible, I tried 4 times last night to upload 5 pictures onto Facebook! My phone constantly states you are not connected or the…

title: perfect
review: Dear Guest, thank you for sending in your review to Tripadvisor following your recent stay at The Delle Nazioni Hotel. Every day we do our best to assure client's comfort and I am sorry to read your comments about a not positive experience.  Regarding the internet Point please be informed that it's free and it's fully functioned. During your stay we did not receive  any complaints about it.  As manager who does follow his hotel daily I am very surprised about your comments on our breakfast. Considering the star rating and the rates we consider our breakfast one of the best of the town for a three star. All previous comments about breakfast are good and we offer American Breakfast to all our clientele ( which is not common in Italy in hotels of our category).  I really cannot accept therefore your comments about the quality of the service.  It could have happen ( sometimes it does happen) that particular morning all clients decided to have breakfast at the same time...it does not mean our breafast is mediocre.  I hope you will reconsider to stay here again so we can take the opportunity to restore your confidence and to assure you of our best attention to your specific needs,  We look forward to welcoming you back when you next visit in Firenze.  Best regards,  Giovanni Mareilla General Manager

title: Excellent location, excellent staff, excellent breakfast, excellent room.
review: Stayed for three days in November. Right across the street from the train station, so it was extremely convenient. Our room was very large and spacious. The breakfast room was also the largest we had in Italy.It had a nice selection to choose from and you wouldn't start your day hungry. The hotel staff was so accomodating and gracious, they were also quick to assist with questions and requests. There was a nice bar and computer room just up steps from the lobby. Easy walking distance to many restaurants. The bed was very comfortable, and the room was extremely clean. I would book this hotel again.

title: Convenient to train station
review: Dear Guest,  GRAZIE! Can’t tell you how happy we are that you found Delle Nazioni Hotel to your liking.   It’s always so encouraging and gratifying to receive such feedback.   Grazie Mille for having stayed with us, it was a true pleasure having you.   We do hope to have you back so, ARRIVEDERCI and thank you again!  Many hughes and kind regards,  Elisabetta Argento

title: A Place To Lay Your Head
review: This was a walk-in registration for a room due to a last-minute change of plans. Even so, the staff were attentive, informative, helpful with suggestions of excursions and seemed prepared to 'bend over backwards' to provide us with any assistance possible. The room was spacious, roomy and clean. The bed was comfortable. The breakfast was excellent with a wide variety of dishes provided.The location was just across the road from Santa Maria Novella Station. In short, I would not consider staying anywhere else in Florence and I do intend to return someday.

title: Not a bad deal overall...
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you!  You have given us the greatest motivational tool any business owner could wish for!   The proof that our extra efforts do make a difference.  Thanks for your beautiful words, we are really pleased to have been your lifeline and moreover to have satisfied your needs and flipped the fate of your vacation!  GRAZIE for having stayed with us.  A big huge from all staff and thanks again for your radiance feedback, we look forward to welcome you again at Delle Nazioni Hotel,  Kindest regards and ARRIVEDERCI!  Elisabetta Argento

title: Next door to SM Novella train station but pathetic wifi (a real pain to use)
review: I was there with a friend the first week of November and arrived from Rome via the Santa Maria Novella Train Station.  The hotel is average, no complaints, but just average for sleeping and showering, although the room was actually pretty spacious and clean.    The great thing about the hotel is it's location.  You are right across from the SMN Train Station which is the hub for getting in/out of Florence!  So if you just need a place to store your suitcases because you'll be out and about like we were, this is a perfect choice!

title: Loved Florence and Our Accomodations
review: Great location next to the train station. Reception Staff rather abrupt and not warm although they answer all your questions. Minimart "Conad" just across the road about 1 minute walk. All major attractions walkable. Wifi was irritatingly weak, slow and unreliable and had very limited bandwidth and data capped. They do give you more accounts to log in at the reception but this was done unwillingly and no improvements to the irritation factor of interrupted surfing. Nowhere to put your shampoo nor toiletteries anywhere in the shower enclosure. Have to leave it on the floor. Breakfast was ok and the saving grace was that my room came with a kitchenette (locked in a wardrobe, to be unlocked separately by the housekeeping). Service staff at the breakfast was rather attentive though…

title: Nothing More then a Basic Hotel
review: Hotel directly across from train station which was very nice after long day's train trip. You can get to other locations with ease.  English speaking staff were courteous, friendly and helpful.  Beds were comfortable and rooms clean and generous in size for triple.  Within walking distance of central Florence.  Nice breakfast.

title: Needs improvement
review: Dear Guest,  Thanks for spending your time to write a review with so nice words and for sharing your experience through Tripadvisor.  It is with immense pleasure to hear that you found everything about Delle Nazioni Hotel amazing, location, accomodation and service. We will be sure to share your lovely words with all our team. We sincerely hope to welcome you again soon.  Happy New Year & warm regards,  Elisabetta Argento

title: Absolutely Wonderful!!!
review: Stayed at the hotel with my daughter after being in Rome, a B&B in Tuscany, and Barcelona. The bathroom was so tiny you could not unfold the shower enclosure and sit on the toilet. After a shower, the floor was so wet it was dangerously slippery.  Asked for a different room and was told that this was the upgrade!  The wifi was most inconvenient as you need a code for each and every device and they don't want to give more than one per room.  When I insisted I needed one for my phone and my kindle and my daughter needed one for her computer - I was grudgingly given more, but then was made to feel like a problem guest. There is a time limit on the code and you have to input the code each time you return to the room.  The breakfast was very good, with plenty of room for all the…

title: Florence
review: Dear Guest,   Many thanks for the time spended to write your review. Our staff is at disposal for any requirement like the changement of rooms, we assign any kind of room to satisfy the guests, in case your wish is for a superior room a difference will be required.   Internet devices are personal, we give to every customer and it is valid for 72 hours of usage but you have to logout from the system as required on the paper otherwise just ask to the front desk where they are happy to give you a new password and username, no limits and no cost; this system has been choosen for the customer's security and privacy.  Hoping to welcoming You again in our Hotel, in order to prove you the better of our services and the best Florence,  Best regards  Elisabetta Argento

title: Terrific Stay, Again!
review: If you ever go to Florence, this hotel is the perfect choice! I've did Rome to Florence by train, so when I got to the station in Florence it was a really pleasant surprise to see that the hotel was just across the street. Let me start by the accommodations of the hotel, they were very clean and well maintained, the rooms spacious but cosy! The common areas were nice and very clean. The staff was so friendly and most of all very helpful, always with a smile in the face and promptly willing to help with any doubt or question you may have. Also a very good thing is that you can have wi-fi access for free in all the areas of the hotel. Just go to the reception and ask for the password. Another very important thing is breakfast, that for a 3 star hotel is excellent! Not only…

title: EXCELENTE
review: Dear Guest,  MILLE GRAZIE for your beautiful review and for the time spent to write it.  Absolutely Wondeful... We like it !!!   With your feedback you have undoubtedly given us an extra boost to continue to raise the standards to which our guests are accustomed to receiving.  Thank you again and many hughes, we look forward to welcome you again at Delle Nazioni Hotel  Merry Christmas & Happy New Year  Elisabetta Argento

title: Not the Best
review: Comfortable bedroom with a large bathroom even the bathroom door could not be closed tightly.  Breakfast is included in room rate. Breakfast with American-style and Italian-style. Lots of menu options, there are cereals, bread, cakes, croissants, a variety of hot drinks and juices, fruit, yogurt and others.  Hotels close to the train station. Outside noise does not disturb us to sleep soundly because soundproof windows. Good quality with reasonable price.

title: Excellent value
review: Dear Customer,  Thank you for your review. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Delle Nazioni Hotel in Florence. Your feedback is very valuable to us and I have shared your feedback with the rest of the team to increase all our services.  We do hope to have you back so, ARRIVEDERCI and thank you again!  Kind Regards, Elisabetta Argento

title: Convenient three star hotel
review: We recently spent 4 nights at Delle Nazioni in Florence.  The hotel is located across from the train station and you can feel the vibrations in the building when the trains go through.  It was probably the noisiest hotel I have ever stayed in, but not because of the trains.  The walls are paper thin, allowing you to clearly hear conversations in the adjoining rooms and in the hallways and the water draining from the rooms above you makes an incredible noise.  The beds in our triple room were fairly comfortable, but it would have been nice to have more than one desk chair to sit in.  When checking in, we asked about the availability of balcony rooms as shown on the hotel's website.  We were told by the desk clerk that they did not have balcony rooms.  We had a nice view of the…

title: Soulless basic hotel
review: Dear Client, Thank you for your recent stay and bringing to our attention your concerns. We take all of our clients concerns seriously but please be advised our proximty to the Santa Maria Novella train station does not constitute a vibration concern. There are rooms available with balconies but these are Superior rooms at an additional cost but during your stay were unavailable, please note you booked a Standard room prior to arrival. As we quickly addressed your room issue and moved you immediately, we would like to exprees to you that on a return visit we would do our best to accomodate you in every way. Best Regards, Giovanni Mariella General Manager

title: Excellent site for Florence
review: I am not one be picky and leave bad reviews, but after staying in 5 different hotels on a recent trip to Europe, I simply cannot rate this one any higher.  Pros: - The location is great, its very close to the station and within easy walk of all the sites in florence. - The lady at the reception was very friendly and helpful.  Cons: - The hotel feels very impersonal, with the exception of the lady at the reception, others are borderline robotic... no smiles, "here's your key, bye" attitude.  - The rooms are like university accommodation/dorms. Long dark corridors, old creaky doors and thin walls. Although our room sizes was decent, the was not comfortable. The room needed a paint and a few new wall hangings ...everything was just very basic and very dated. They have a vending…

title: Excellent stay
review: Dear Tripadvisor user, I apologize if your stay at Delle Nazioni was not as you expected. I am sorry for your impression of the hotel was not satisfactory but I have to point out a few things: - Considering the star rating and rates we consider our breakfast one of the best of the town for three stars. All previous comments about the breakfast are good and we offer American Breakfast to all our clientele ( which is not common in Italy in hotels of our category). - Every week, or as  needed, we  paint the walls of the rooms. In Italy, a three star hotel, is not obliged to have mini bar in the room and for this you have found vending machine , not in the corridor, but at the exit of the elevator. On our web site and  on other all this is reported. Did you report your discomfort  to the reception desk?  I wish I had the possibility to resolve the matter during your stay with us if only I had this information. Anyway thanks for your reviews which had my best attention.  Best regards, Giovanni Mariella General Manager

title: Convenient but soulless
review: Arrived on 6th Oct left on the 10th- Hotel was perfectly sited for all the major attractions-also alongside the main train station approx 100yards from  airport bus stop, room was excellent as was the buffet breakfast -excellent variety of food provided, warm and freindly staff, would defimitely return to this hotel

On behalf of all the staff at Delle Nazioni Hotel, who provided you with the great service all our customers have grown to expect from us.  Many thanks for having stayed with us, we wait for you in the near future,  Kindest regards and ARRIVEDERCI!  Elisabetta Argento

title: Convenient
review: The hotel is situated very close to the train station literally! However there are many shops and restaurants around that you can easily walk to, as well as many of the tourist attractions, the rooms are very clean, although the shower/bath things are interesting... All round a good spot to stay :)

title: Location & view
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for your kind words and for sharing your experience through Tripadvisor. title: Nice place next to the train station
review: Conveniently located next to Florence's ugly railway station the Delle Nazioni has everything you'd expect of a three star hotel. I particularly liked the framed album covers used as decoration throughout. It's an easy walk from the hotel to most of the city's major tourist attractions and there's a very good restaurant offering a discount to the hotel's guests nearby. Note that the infuriating tourist tax has to be paid in cash so if you only use cards be sure to have some money on you!

title: Interesting hotel, good location
review: Dear Sir,  Thank you for your review. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Delle Nazioni Hotel in Florence.   We are delighted that you are happy about the restaurant's suggestion and we are very proud that our team delivered a great service to you and that we met your expectations.  We are glad that you highlights the method of payment of the city tax because we wrote it in many web sites, booking confirmation, e-mail... title: Lovely hotel outside Firenze Station
review: The hotel is well located, close to the train station Santa Maria Novella. The hotel was renovated. The rooms are very good. The amazing thing is that you have no control over the temperature of the air conditioner. Who defines the temperature of your room is the guy at the reception, who turn off the air conditioning after midnight. So, if you like to sleep at a temperature of 27C, this is your place. The bathroom is good. The breakfast has plenty of options. The wifi also works well.

title: Great location, clean and friendly environment!
review: Hotel was lovely. Our room was delightful!! overlooking the Firenze station and the majestic Duomo. The room was spacious, bright and had an amazing balcony overlooking the Duomo.  There are several good restaurants that provide the hotel guests a discount on their meals.  All the staff were friendly, spoke English and were very helpful. Best of all,Free Wi Fi in every room!!

title: A great stay
review: Dear Customer,  Thank you very much for your kind words and for sharing your experience with us.  It is with immense pleasure that we hear that you found everything about Delle Nazioni Hotel amazing, location, accomodation and service. We will be sure to share your lovely words with all our team. We sincerely hope to welcome you again soon. Sincerely yours,  Elisabetta Argento

title: Excellent Staff and Hotel
review: It is literally 2-3 min from the train station. Very convenient if you don't want to carry your luggage around. It is also close to almost everything; everything is walking distant. The room was clean and had wifi. Breakfast had a great selection. The staff was nice and willingly to help. They gave me a map and a sheet on all the places I could visit with the time they were opened. The only problem that I encountered during my stay was that they were having problems with the hot water.  To be honest, I didn't miss it, since it was really hot. Overall, I had a pleasant stay and I would definitely recommend this hotel!

title: Convenient and friendly and v good value
review: This hotel is so centrally located that you won't regret to book it. We booked 2 rooms in this hotel. And we arrived by train to Florence from Naples and we just had to cross the street to get to the hotel. When we arrived before the checking time we were promptly greeted and checked in. The room is big and clean. Is not a luxury hotel but comfortable enough to make your stay pleasant. We had a wonderful balcony with a beautiful view of the city of Florence. The breakfast was very good. Eggs, ham, cheese, cereals, juices, pastries, bread, etc. Everything is within walking distance. I was so glad we made the decision of choosing Delle Nazioni for our Florence stay. I will definitely come back to Florence and I will stay in the same hotel.

title: Lovely Hotel,oustanding service
review: Dear Madame,  Thank you for your review. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Delle Nazioni Hotel in Florence.   Your feedback is very valuable to us and I have shared your feedback with the rest of the team.  We look forward to welcome you back to Florence for a new experience Sincerely Elisabetta Argento

title: Good Hotel, great location
review: Had spent a delightful few days at this hotel. The reception staff very helpful and made you feel welcome. The room we were given (although not on the fourth floor with balcony) was very spacious and very clean. Breakfast was not bad too although we should have asked for coffee from the bar when offered as the coffee from the machine was awful. Maybe just got used to the excellent coffee in the cafes.

title: Great Place good location just needs better AC units
review: This hotel is the best hotel we stayed during our stay in whole Europe. Customer service was excellent. Loved the breakfast buffet. walking distance from the Metro station SMN. The front desk people were very friendly and they were always willing to help us with directions and where to eat etc. Lobby area was nice and they have 6 computers for internet access. Had a nice experience.

title: Great Hotel
review: This is a good hotel just across the road from train station. The staff like Fabio, and Luca are very friendly and room was clean and comfortable, WiFi was great and the breakfast was very good. The only thing they need to improve is there AC units don't work that great we needed to ask the front desk for some fans to sleep better. I was there in July 2013 and was hot weather even for a guy from Texas...you need better AC units!

title: Good hotel next to main station.
review: Older Hotel but great location, service & staff. Breakfast was good aside from the packet mix scramble egg they were more than happy to accommodate Gluten free requirements. We were on the second and 4th floor  and noise seemed to be a problem in one of the rooms at night time. Staff were very attentive trying to fix the issue. The bar staff were fantastic and would make you coffee or drinks 24hrs, they gave us free nibblies and shots and travel advice while we were staying there

title: Basic, convenient but worth it for a few days.
review: This is a good hotel across the road from the main station. Staff were very friendly and the room was clean and comfortable, wifi was strong and the breakfast was better than standard european. Good hotel for a short stay.

title: Our stay at Hotel Delle Nazioni, Florence
review: We arrived in florence by train so it was very handy to walk around the corner and find our hotel right there, especially carrying big rucksacks. The first night we stayed on the second floor corner and found it incredibly noisey and had a bad nights sleep but, when we told the staff they happily moved us to the 4th floor at the rear of the hotel with a nice view. The breakfast is standard but does the job and the rooms are comfotable. The hotel is very near the centre and very clean.

title: So friendly
review: We had a wonderful stay at the hotel.  We were really fortunately to have a room with a few of the Duomo.  Really a wonderful surprise.  It made our stay much more worth it.  The room was clean, and new towels every day.  The staff was always friendly, and breakfast was great.  And just a step away from the train station.

title: Bad hotel
review: I just loved this hotel!! everything was excellent. The stuff was very kind and heplful, I loved the breakfast. It was very tasty. The rooms were comfortable and always clean. And the restaurant they advise was a very good one.I would like to go back there.

title: Average hotel in an expensive city
review: This hotel in conveniently located minutes from the Santa Maria Novella train station. Our room was clean and comfortable with a modern design. Breakfast was excellent, eggs, cold cuts, breads, fruit, etc.. The desk staff was extremely helpful with their suggestions and recommendations. I would not hesitate to return again!

title: Good location, service. Not very good sleep
review: Dear Guest, we really thank you for your review and we are happy to see that you completely understood the meaning and the atmosphere of our Hotel.  We work really hard to transfer to our guests the feelings we have and the mood of the hotel and of the staff so that all of them can feel part of us and we really appreciate when someone like you can see all this.  Hope to have you here again and make your xperience be even better than the last time.   Sincerely yours Elisabetta Argento

title: April 2013
review: If arriving by train, take the right exit once you alight from the platform. The hotel is about 100m away on the right. If you use the train for coming in and out of Florence, then the location is ideal.  The room - we had a triple. Basic but clean.   Bathroom - a miserable shower cubicle which is rather small. No ventilation. Had to open the window to air.  Breakfast - horrible. Basic european breakfast but poor quality of food.

title: Hotel is at a good location
review: When we arrived the hotel - Great perfect location! just 30 seconds walk from the train station. it was right infront.  The hotel staff were great, helped us through everything. Free wi-fi.  We got upgraded with our room - one thing annoying, we got an upgrade, which was nice and all, but our new room was an apartment, and we had a closet with a kitchen inside. One door was open and one was locked. We asked them to open the locked one and their comment was "You were not eligible to this room, it was an upgrade, therefor you can't use it" My opinion is - if you upgrade someone you don't block or disallow some of the services  Other than that - location - AWESOME! 10 minutes walk to the doumo, 15 minutes walk from all kinds of musemus, city center. We bought 2 days bus pass which…

title: good for the location
review: Of the three hotels I stayed at in Italy, this was my favorite. The room was clean and modern looking, and the hotel staff was by FAR the nicest. It was refreshing to find a really nice staff, because at some other hotels the reception didn't seem like they wanted to be bothered with. My belongings felt safe and secure. The location is good too, literally a few minute walk from Santa Maria Novella and the San Lorenzo open air markets. It's also right next to the termini, which has an underground mall in it! Yay! Another big plus was a 99 euro cent store close to it as well, it's a great place to pick up provisions.My only critique was that the shower (as expected) was small, but it had no shelves in it to place soap, shampoo, etc. All in all, a really awesome hotel. Most…

title: Only good location. Room is bad. Only for budget traveller.
review: Dear Liz,  Thank you for your review. We are very pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay here at the Delle Nazioni Hotel in Florence. Your feedback is very valuable to us and I have shared your feedback with the rest of the team, these reviews are our strength for a greater commitment We look forward to welcome you back to the Hotel Sincerely Elisabetta Argento

title: MY HOTEL ROOM WAS BURGLARIZED!!!
review: Just across the station. That's the main advantage.  Rooms are average and the bathrooms are small. Very small showers... so don't move much :) If you are spending less time in rooms... then you can choose this place. Free internet. There is no safe place to store you baggage in case you checkout and want to pick up later. They have a room, where anyone can store and pick up anyones baggage ( at your own risk). Breakfast is avg... just basic continental. TV is from from the 80s.. and we didn't care to check if it works.  There is no ramp at the entrance.. just steps.. and you need to pick up for luggage, which could be difficult. Choose this place for the location and basic stay.

title: Good location..average hotel
review: Dear M Vijay, We thank you for staying with us and for your time to provide us with your review about your recent stay.   We take this opportunity to inform all guests whom decide to spend their holiday in old italian cities, that our laws for the protection of the architectural not allow to make some changes to the old palaces and therefore many amenities that can be found in modern hotel chains are being penalized, on the other hand, if you choose the modern hotels you have to deal with the distance from the center. We hope that you appreciated our free wi-fi connection instead to pay an extra charge as required in many modern hotel chain of Europe.  We are very sorry to hear that our breakfast is avg continental, we offer cold and hot like cereals, yoghurt, 2 cakes, various croissants, tomatoes, fresh fruit, scrambles eggs, three kind of bread, slice's bread for toast, ham, cheese, rusks, various marmelade, cream chocolate, butter, fruit juices and the machine with italian and american coffee, chocolate, tea, milk.   We greatly appreciate your time to leave us with your detailed and honest feedback, as it is a learning opportunity to improve and make the necessary changes.   We hope on your next stay you will have a much better experience and a greater feeling of what this hotel can really offer you.   Thank you again for your time and we definitely look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back in the near future. Sincerely, Elisabetta Argento

title: Clean room , friendly staff, great location
review: bad, same breakfast every day. freind ly and helpful staff. Nearby all good paces and near to santa maria novella station. No kettle in room, no minibar. The view was horrible. staff good. People charge for coffe also!!!!!!!!! Average size rooms. very small toilets. Good laction. Everything nearby is easily accesible like train station, grocery stores etc

title: Mosquitoes everywhere!
review: Dear Tripadvisor user, We are very surprised about your review. First of all we wish to thank you for the good words you wrote about our staff. We would like to inform you that our is a three star -hotel and as you may read on our web site the hotel has not kettle and mini-bar in the rooms. All this is not common in Italy in hotels of our category.  You  know that the hotel has dispensing machines on floors for soft drinks and snack. You made a reservation for a standard room, and this type of room has not view and balcony. The rooms with these type of requirements are Superior. We are very sorry if your stay with us has not been satisfactory and we hope to have another occasion in order to prove you the better of our service. Best regards, Giovanni Mariella  General Manage

title: Average but Clean
review: We stayed here 3 nights this may. Part of a Florence Venice package from Gate 1 Travel. the room was very clean and the staff were friendly and helpful. The elevator was nice to have as some hotels in Europe do not have one. The location was great , all the sights were an easy walk to get to. We took the train to venice after our stay, so the train was right across the street , which was also convenient Plenty of places to eat nearby. We didn't hear the trains, our room was in the back on the 2nd floor. The shower was small but so what, the city was fantastic . I would not hesitate to stay here again

title: honeymoon stay
review: This hotel is located just by the train station. Around 15mins walking distance from city centre. Breakfast was poor. Rooms a little outdated but clean. Staff was friendly and helpful. Parking right next door to the hotel but not cheap.

title: Great location - great veranda
review: we stayed here as part of our honeymoon, we were given an upgrade to a delux room and a free bottle of wine. the staff were very helpful with booking tickets and trips. the location is excellent being within walking distance to all of florences main attractions. We would highly recomend staying in this hotel.

title: Great stay!
review: Dear Mr John,  Thanks for your beautiful words. We are really happy to be part of a memory so special, the honeymoon should be remembered as a happy moment of our life. We hope to welcome you again in the near future, perhaps to celebrate a wedding anniversary. Many congratulations again by all our staff Sincerely, Elisabetta Argento

title: Worst hotel ever!
review: The hotel is located right next to the main train station in Florence, which makes it the most convenient location ever. Our room was huge, with a double and single, loads of plug points, and a big cupboard - and we had a lovely veranda that overlooked the roofs of Florence, where we enjoyed many a bottle of Chianti before heading out into the city for dinner. The breakfast was limited but good and they were happy to leave the food out after the 10am cut-off if you were a bit late getting down to the room. The wifi was also great. Only improvement would be to provide more than one room key, given we were two friends travelling together, and be able to provide a list of good local restaurants when asked (my sister's hotel provided them with a great list, but our reception staff…
